      • addUpdate

        void addUpdate(java.util.Date date,
               int twelveAmount,
               int twentyAmount,
               double paid)
        Adds the given amount of twelve and twenty canisters, and the money paid, and the given date.
        Parameters:
        date - the date of the buy
        twelveAmount - Amount of twelve canisters
        twentyAmount - Amount of twenty canisters
        paid - Amount of money paid

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Checks if the customer is empty. A Customer is empty if and only if the balances are 0, and there are not lastDates, and the paid method returns 0.
        Returns:
        true if the customer is empty, false otherwise
